item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

We had an awesome turnout last month.  I hope you enjoyed it.  I am pleased to announce the April Boston Karaoke Meetup for 2012.  We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM so please try to get there by 6PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

I am disabling guests this month to make sure I can create a Name Tag for everyone.  If you do have a guest, please ask them RSVP themselves.  Make sure your name is spelled correctly on the Meetup Site so that your Name Tag will be correct.

To make sure you have  a spot, please sign up early.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - April 2012
